page.title: 16LEISURE
page.content: Many people have to travel to Bletchley,Milton Keynes and other surrounding districts for any organised leisure activities. but many villagers spend their spare time at home either reading,watching television or gardening and maintaining their own homes. There are several clubs held in the village which are fairly well attended; Football and Cricket Clubs,Model Aeroplane Club, Darts and Dominoes, Yoga. There is a Tuesday Club for the local O.A.P. who recently went on a day visit to the seaside. The village band and choir practice reguarly. The toddlers attend the village playgroup and there is a Music Group for slightly older children and a Youth Club.A Pony Trekking Centre on the farm was opened a short while ago. { Council.
